name: Coin Grabber
description:
Hello, my name is Nicholas Martinez. This is my second game that I'm releasing to the public and I hope to continue on this path to becoming a great video game developer. As your playing this game, if there is anything you want to ask or notify me about, feel free to ask on the comment section here or on twitter (https://twitter.com/QUICKALAS529 )

Also, feel free to check out my first ever game right here: https://quickalas.itch.io/escape

Credits

All sounds, art, and programming done by Nicholas Martinez, copyright 2016, all rights reserved.
